short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sapphire is an advanced site blocker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sapphire Site Blocker is as the name suggests a site blocker. Which allows you to block websites, subpages, and even just words for the URLs you visit online.

Sapphire is very flexible, with both a black- and whitelist, so you can for example block example.com but allow subsite.example.com or example.com/site.

You can also choose any website / URL that you want to be redirected to when a site is blocked. 

Sapphire also comes with a built-in focus mode, which makes it harder to turn Sapphire off, and allows you to track how much time you have spent being productive.

Enjoy Sapphire :)
